document_data.mainbody:
Bug Bludgeon was a gloom staler ranger member of The Guild in the late 15 century DR.
Bug was a gold dwarf man with a pale skin tone, curly light brown hair, and hairless face. He wore a splint mail with its metal dyed in emerald-green â€“ the Guilds telltale colors. He was armed with a bow.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Bug Bludgeon worked under Farlin, who led a gang of Guild members, dealing with the Stone Lord and his men. The new kingpin secretly served the Absolute and was trying to remove the Guilds influence from across the Gate. Farlins group faced a band of Stone Lords men led by tiefling Cairos, under the Wyrms Crossing bridge in Rivington. However, the meeting devolved into a battle. Bug Bludgeons and his squads fate remained uncertain were they killed by the gangsters or survived and returned safely to the Guilds safehouse.
